challenges.title: Crazy Lists
challenges.description: You need to solve a common problem that happens when scrolling through several items. After scrolling, do the elements look the same?
challenges.help:
You need to fix the scrolling issues for the list. 

Scroll to the last item, then scroll back and you will see how the colored type bars have changed its initial color.

challenges.title: Listen to Me
challenges.description: Loading data and updating the state of a static list might result in UI issues.
challenges.help:
You have a limit of items to select. Even if you are far from reaching the limit, scrolling is still an issue to properly keep the checked items. 

Keep an eye on your position.

challenges.title: All about the details
challenges.description:
Imagine you are a new team member, your first task is to implement a classic detail view. 

First solve 'Crazy Lists' challenge.
challenges.help:
Use all the hooks available inside the common and components packages to display a new screen when clicking any item on the list 

Review the data folder to see how our API calls work.

challenges.title: Archie
challenges.description: Our project gets bigger and we have new teammates. Is time to create reusable components inside our app context.
challenges.help: Work In Progress. Come back later!

challenges.title: Navigation Component
challenges.description: Showcase of the Android Jetpack Navigation Component, designed to delegate much of navigation logic to a centralized hub.
